mapper.select: select (select aa.param_value from comm_params aa where aa.param_group = 'wallet_task' and aa.param_key = #{paramKey}) as 'confirmShareDetailTime' , (select ab.working_day_flag from wj_confirm_share_date_info ab where ab.batch_date_int = #{ymdInt}) as 'workingDayFlag' from dual
select csd.batch_date_int as 'batch_time_str' from wj_confirm_share_date_info csd where csd.batch_date_int > #{ymdInt} and csd.working_day_flag = 'Y' order by csd.batch_date_int limit 0,2
